pkgmetadata.longdescription: Regularized Wasserstein Distances and Barycenters // Computations of entropy regularized Wasserstein Distances, a.k.a. dual- Sinkhorn divergences, and entropy regularized Wasserstein Barycenters. Relevant papers are Marco Cuturi (2013) arXiv:1306.0895, Marco Cuturi (2014) arXiv:1310.4375 and Jason Altschuler et al. arXiv:1705.09634.
